content.raw:
I just set the gazebo-dev-devel build to report as unstable if there are greater than 0 warnings of any kind.  Let's see how that goes.

In general, we can set a threshold for how many warnings will cause the build to be flagged as unstable and an equivalent threshold for flagging the build as failed.

I'll look into integrating the code_check.sh tools.
